SEARCH
Package elpasominersbank

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
elpasominersbank.Person
elpasominersbank.Customer
public class Customer extends Person
Represents a type of person called bank customer. It has unique attributes such as: customer ID, phone number, checking account, saving account, credit account

      Parameters:
      firstName - customer's first name
      lastName - customer's last name
      birthday - customer's date of birth
      address - customer's address
      ID - customer's uniquie identification number
      phoneNum - customer's phone number

      savingAccount - customer's saving account
      creditAccount - customer's checking account
